H0.text: What colour/color is Mr Bump in Hargreaves' Mr Men series of children's cartoon books. Red

H1.text: What colour/color is Mr Bump in Hargreaves' Mr Men series of children's cartoon books. Yellow

H2.text: What colour/color is Mr Bump in Hargreaves' Mr Men series of children's cartoon books. Green

H3.text: What colour/color is Mr Bump in Hargreaves' Mr Men series of children's cartoon books. Blue

A4.text: Mr. Bump is a blue Mr. Man who just can't help having accidents.
